name: claude-agent-worker
description: Claude Agent SDK on Cloudflare Containers

scripts.build: npm run build:container && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npx wrangler@latest deploy
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && npm run deploy && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd container && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
